ai-patthana16.91:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.91:1.1_0: One doesn’t get rid of insisting on teaching, nor proclaiming condition.
ai-patthana16.91:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.91:2.1_0: Not being visible in this way, they don’t give rise to unsuitable things.
ai-patthana16.91:2.1_1: Not seeing the cause, future rebirths, and women, they don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana16.91:2.1_2: Such things don’t arise, or specific conditionally forgetable, or dependently originated.
